mapper.select:
SELECT t.id,t.serial_num,t.status,t.type,o.id as appid,m.title,m.phone,p.`name` as channelName ,g.model_number,b.`name` as brandsName FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies o ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON m.id = t.merchant_id LEFT JOIN pay_channels p ON p.id = t.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id = t.good_id LEFT JOIN good_brands b ON b.id = g.good_brands_id
WHERE t.customer_id = #{id} AND t.`status` = #{frontStatus} AND t.serial_num like '%${serialNum}%' ORDER BY t.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offSetPage},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(*) FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies o ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON m.id = t.merchant_id LEFT JOIN pay_channels p ON p.id = t.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON g.id = t.good_id LEFT JOIN good_brands b ON b.id = g.good_brands_id
WHERE t.customer_id = #{id} AND t.`status` = #{frontStatus} AND t.serial_num like '%${serialNum}%' ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
SELECT t.`status` FROM terminals t GROUP BY t.`status` HAVING t.`status` is not NULL

SELECT u.id ,u.`username` FROM agents s LEFT JOIN customer_agent_relations c ON c.agent_id = s.id LEFT JOIN customers u ON u.id = c.customer_id WHERE s.customer_id = #{customerId}
and u.name like '%${name}%'
SELECT id FROM terminals WHERE serial_num =#{terminalsNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM terminals t WHERE t.serial_num=#{terminalsNum} and customer_id is null
mapper.update: UPDATE terminals SET customer_id = #{userId} WHERE serial_num = #{terminalsNum}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) from customers WHERE username=#{username}
SELECT count(*) FROM terminals WHERE serial_num = #{serialNum}

SELECT a.id,a.receiver,a.moblephone,a.address,a.zip_code as zipCode,a.is_default as isDefault,a.city_id as cityId,c.`id` as cityId,c.`name` as sonName,s.`name` as parentName FROM customer_addresses a LEFT JOIN cities c ON c.id = a.city_id LEFT JOIN cities s ON s.id = c.parent_id WHERE a.customer_id=#{customerId}
SELECT serial_num serialNum, pay_channel_id payChannelId FROM terminals WHERE customer_id = #{customerId} and serial_num is not null and pay_channel_id is not null
SELECT t.id,t.serial_num FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN merchants m on t.merchant_id=m.id WHERE m.phone=#{phone}
SELECT * from customer_addresses WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
select count(*) from opening_applies where terminal_id = #{terminalId}
SELECT * FROM cities
SELECT * FROM cities WHERE parent_id = #{parentId}

SELECT t.id,t.serial_num,t.`status`,g.model_number,b.name as brandName,a.name as factorName,m.title,m.phone,e.order_number,date_format(e.created_at,'%Y-%c-%d %h:%i:%s') as createdAt,c.`name` as channelName,l.`id` as appId,l.`status` as applieStatus,e.types FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN order_goods o on o.order_id = t.order_id and o.good_id = t.good_id LEFT JOIN goods g on o.good_id=g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands b on g.good_brands_id=b.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels c on c.id=t.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN factories a ON c.factory_id=a.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id=m.id LEFT JOIN orders e ON t.order_id=e.id LEFT JOIN opening_applies l ON l.terminal_id = t.id WHERE t.id=#{id} AND e.customer_id=t.customer_id

SELECT s.id,s.terminal_rate,d.trade_type,d.trade_value,y.service_rate,t.base_rate,l.`status` FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN support_trade_types s ON t.pay_channel_id = s.pay_channel_id LEFT JOIN dictionary_trade_types d ON d.id = s.trade_type_id LEFT JOIN dictionary_billing_cycles y ON y.id = t.billing_cycles_id LEFT JOIN terminal_trade_type_infos l ON l.trade_type_id = s.trade_type_id WHERE t.id=#{id} and l.terminal_id = #{id}

SELECT s.created_at,s.content,c.`name` FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies i ON t.id=i.terminal_id LEFT JOIN opening_apply_marks s ON i.id=s.opening_apply_id LEFT JOIN customers c ON s.custom_id=c.id where t.id=#{id}
SELECT s.`key`,s.`value`,s.types FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN opening_applies i ON t.id=i.terminal_id LEFT JOIN terminal_opening_infos s ON i.id=s.opening_applies_id where t.id=#{id}

SELECT g.has_lease,g.lease_price,g.lease_time,g.lease_deposit, g.return_time ,g.lease_description, date_format(o.updated_at,'%Y-%m-%d') as created_at FROM terminals t LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.id = t.order_id where t.id = #{id}
SELECT s.id,s.`name` FROM pay_channels s
SELECT d.id,d.`name` FROM pay_channels s LEFT JOIN pay_channel_billing_cycles p ON p.pay_channel_id = s.id LEFT JOIN dictionary_billing_cycles d ON d.id = p.billing_cycles_id WHERE s.id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM terminals WHERE serial_num=#{serialNum}
SELECT id from merchants WHERE title=#{title}
